subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Radek Stepanek used deep ground strokes and crafty drop shots to beat Robby Ginepri, 6-7 (5), 6-4, 6-1, and move to the finals of the SAP Open in San Jose, Calif. Stepanek will play the top-seeded Andy Roddick, a 7-6 (2), 6-1 winner over Guillermo García-López.
